reference.title: Pierre's General Store Hours & Location
reference.shortdesc: Pierre's General Store (aka Pierre's) is a Pelican Town staple, owned and operated by Pierre himself. This small business is in direct competition with the corporate owned JojaMart.

sl.sli: *Once the community center has been restored, Pierre's will be open every day.
Pierre's is located in the north of Town Square, next to the doctor's office.
